snippet: Robert Rizzo, the former city manager of Bell, was also ordered to make restitution of $8.8 million in a scheme that nearly bankrupted the blue-collar city.
abstract: Robert Rizzo, former city manager of Bell, Calif, is sentenced to 12 years in prison and ordered to make restitution of $8.8 million in scheme that nearly bankrupted blue-collar city.
lead_paragraph: Robert Rizzo, the former city manager of Bell, was also ordered to make restitution of $8.8 million in a scheme that nearly bankrupted the blue-collar city.

headline.main: California: Manager Who Bled City Receives 12 Years in Prison
headline.print_headline: California: Manager Who Bled City Gets 12 Years
